summary: AN ORDINANCE regulating newsstands in public places; adding new designated Sections 19-A, 19-B, 19-C, 19.-d, 19-E and 19-F to Ordinance 90047 to impose certain requirements, establish various standards implemented through a permit system, and confirm certain regulatory powers upon the Board of Public Works; and amending Section 6 and repealing Section 22-A of said Ordinance 90047.
